Support the Project

Lower Level 2.0 is a passion project built in my spare time. If you enjoy the world and want to help it grow, there are several ways to get involved.

────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

[ Financial Support ]

Help cover hosting costs and fund new features.

[ Looking For Collaborators ]

I'm actively looking for:

  • 3D Modelers — Expand the basement with new rooms and props
  • Lighting Experts — Improve atmosphere and Quest optimization
  • VRChat World Builders — Help with SDK setup and deployment
  • UdonSharp Developers — Build new interactive features

[ Other Ways to Help ]

  • Visit the world — Every visit helps with VRChat's discovery algorithm
  • Favorite the world — Boosts visibility in search results
  • Share with friends — Word of mouth is the best marketing
  • Report bugs — Open an issue on GitHub
  • Star the repo — GitHub Repository
